title: Year of the Goat Icon
body:
I sent a mystery chest to my friend and Its been about two days and I still haven't received the Goat Icon. Anyone know whats going on? 

"Bestow a Lunar Revel Mystery Box or a Mystery Chest on a friend to collect the Year of the Goat icon."

^^ Ive done this... 

Thank you

replies.body: idk how to submit a ticket or mail Riot please help. I want my icon.
What day was it exactly that you did this? The event did not start as soon as the announcement was made.

That's when the [Lunar Revel sales](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/welcome-new-year-these-lunar-revel-sales) went on, but *not* when the [Lunar Revel](http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/lunar-revel-2015/#sales) actually started. As you can see, the sales include the mystery gifting, but not the icon as a gift, that's in the actual Lunar Revel.

It was pretty damn close, though. If you make a support ticket and send it in to Riot, asking nicely, they might give it to you without you having to buy another gift.

Best of luck with it!
Oh ok thank you so much!! :)
Tell me of the result! I'd like to know how lenient Riot games actually are.
Sent them a ticket just then lets see what happen! :3

*replying so this appears on your notifications*

I know that I completely forget things if they aren't on my notifications. :P
